scripts.reinstall-dependencies: npm run x:uninstall-devDependencies && npm run x:uninstall-dependencies && rm -rf ./.angular ./dist ./node_modules ./package-lock.json && npm run x:install-dependencies && npm run x:install-devDependencies
scripts.x:install-dependencies: npm install @angular/cdk @angular/common @angular/compiler @angular/core @angular/forms @angular/material @angular/platform-browser @angular/router @angular/service-worker @jsverse/transloco @supabase/supabase-js ga-gtag rxjs store2 tslib
scripts.x:install-devDependencies: npm install --save-dev @angular/build @angular/cli @angular/compiler-cli @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/prompt-cli @jsverse/transloco-keys-manager @jsverse/transloco-optimize @ngx-env/builder @types/ga-gtag angular-eslint eslint eslint-plugin-perfectionist husky jsdom lint-staged prettier prettier-plugin-css-order prettier-plugin-organize-imports supabase typescript typescript-eslint vitest
scripts.x:uninstall-dependencies: npm uninstall @angular/cdk @angular/common @angular/compiler @angular/core @angular/forms @angular/material @angular/platform-browser @angular/router @angular/service-worker @jsverse/transloco @supabase/supabase-js ga-gtag rxjs store2 tslib
scripts.x:uninstall-devDependencies: npm uninstall @angular/build @angular/cli @angular/compiler-cli @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional @commitlint/prompt-cli @jsverse/transloco-keys-manager @jsverse/transloco-optimize @ngx-env/builder @types/ga-gtag angular-eslint eslint eslint-plugin-perfectionist husky jsdom lint-staged prettier prettier-plugin-css-order prettier-plugin-organize-imports supabase typescript typescript-eslint vitest
